creditline: The John R. Van Derlip Fund and the Mary Griggs Burke Endowment Fund established by the Mary Livingston Griggs and Mary Griggs Burke Foundation; purchase from the Thomas Murray Collection
description: round, wooden carved plate, with raised edges, like a shallow bowl; carvings of swirling and looping shapes, with smaller intricate carved designs on face of bowl; carved hexagon shapes on outside of bowl
title: Round plate (otcike)
